New release for Postiz: New Feature: Sets
entry.content:
You can now create Sets in the settings page.

Sets let you create a template of the workflow of the post, for example: You can create a set containing all your default personal accounts and add some settings. When you create a new post, you can choose the set, and it will automatically turn everything on based on what you specified.

More Examples: - Set for a customer - Set for personal accounts - Set for business accounts

New release for Postiz: Convert a post to multiple posts with AI
entry.content: Imagine this: you have written a long post for LinkedIn, but discovered it is not too long for Bluesky. No worries! The new AI tool will convert your post to match Bluesky in one click!
